name: Working Overtime (2Bros)
description:
"Hello and welcome to your new gas station job! Don't mind that it's in the middle of nowhere, just come on in and we'll get you started. What's that? You wanna know what that statue is? well then, you're gonna have to stay longer if you want to survive...."

DISCLAIMER: I am a new game developer and am still learning new things, a BUNCH of new bug fixes and patches will be released over the course of a few months, so please be patient but i would LOVE to hear ideas/bugs i missed from y'all, so please have fun, and support me as i continue my journey.
